description: This file contains a Spring Boot REST controller for managing flight entities within a flight status service platform. It includes endpoints for creating, retrieving, listing, updating, and deleting flights, with appropriate validation, error handling, and documentation annotations.

classes.name: FlightController
classes.description: A REST controller for handling CRUD operations and queries related to flight entities in the flight status service.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new flight entry, enforcing uniqueness constraints, and returns a response object representing the created flight.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Retrieves a flight by its UUID, throwing a NotFoundException if not found.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Lists flights based on optional filters: flightDate and airlineCode. If no filters are specified, returns all flights.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Performs a full update of a flight identified by UUID, checking for conflicts with existing flights.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a flight by UUID, throwing NotFoundException if the flight does not exist.

methods.name: toResponse
methods.description: Converts a FlightEntity instance to a FlightResponse DTO for output.
